publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3388 Mr Kenny MacAskill: 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council—That the Parliament congratulates the Nordic Council on its 50th anniversary; notes the benefits that the council has brought to the peoples, regions and nations of the Nordic area in terms of social, political and economic co-operation; sees the organisation as a potential model for the peoples, regions and nations of the islands of Britain and Ireland, and believes that closer political ties and links with the Nordic Council and between the Scottish Executive and the Nordic Council of Ministers should be developed.Supported by: Tavish Scott*, Irene Oldfather*

S1M-3388*#* Mr Kenny MacAskill: 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council—That the Parliament congratulates the Nordic Council on its 50th anniversary; notes the benefits that the council has brought to the peoples, regions and nations of the Nordic area in terms of social, political and economic co-operation; sees the organisation as a potential model for the peoples, regions and nations of the islands of Britain and Ireland, and believes that closer political ties and links with the Nordic Council and between the Scottish Executive and the Nordic Council of Ministers should be developed.Supported by: Tavish Scott, Irene Oldfather
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Michael Matheson*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Alex Neil*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Christine Grahame*

S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3388# 50th Anniversary of the Nordic Council (lodged on 12 September 2002) Irene McGugan*
